Gene.FullName: PMS1 homolog 2, mismatch repair system component

Classification.Comment: The c.1771delT pathogenic mutation, located in coding exon 11 of the PMS2 gene, results from a deletion of one nucleotide at nucleotide position 1771, causing a translational frameshift with a predicted alternate stop codon (p.C591Vfs*4). This variant is considered to be rare based on population cohorts in the Genome Aggregation Database (gnomAD). This alteration is expected to result in loss of function by premature protein truncation or nonsense-mediated mRNA decay. As such, this alteration is interpreted as a disease-causing mutation.
